items.text: A Song of degrees for Solomon.
items.plainText: A Song of degrees for Solomon.

items.text: Except the LORD build the house, they labour in vain that build it: except the LORD keep the city, the watchman waketh but in vain.
items.plainText: Except the LORD build the house, they labour in vain that build it: except the LORD keep the city, the watchman waketh but in vain.

items.text: It is vain for you to rise up early, to sit up late, to eat the bread of sorrows: for so he giveth his beloved sleep.
items.plainText: It is vain for you to rise up early, to sit up late, to eat the bread of sorrows: for so he giveth his beloved sleep.

items.text: Lo, children are an heritage of the LORD: and the fruit of the womb is his reward.
items.plainText: Lo, children are an heritage of the LORD: and the fruit of the womb is his reward.

items.text: As arrows are in the hand of a mighty man; so are children of the youth.
items.plainText: As arrows are in the hand of a mighty man; so are children of the youth.

items.text: Happy is the man that hath his quiver full of them: they shall not be ashamed, but they shall speak with the enemies in the gate.
items.plainText: Happy is the man that hath his quiver full of them: they shall not be ashamed, but they shall speak with the enemies in the gate.
